sunrise.title: Before Sunrise
sunrise.repart: Ethan Hawke as Jesse, Julie Delpy as Celine
sunrise.review: "Before Sunrise" is a romantic film that follows Jesse and Celine, two young people who meet on a train in Europe and decide to spend a night together in Vienna before separating the next day. The film focuses on their deep emotional connection and the intimate conversations they have while exploring the city. It is a captivating film that captures the magic of a chance encounter and the exploration of human connection.

sunset.title: Before Sunset
sunset.repart: Ethan Hawke as Jesse, Julie Delpy as Celine
sunset.review: "Before Sunset" picks up the story of Jesse and Celine nine years after their first encounter in Vienna. Jesse, now a writer, reunites with Celine in Paris during a book promotion tour. The film follows their conversation as they walk around the city and explores how their lives have changed since their first meeting. It is a moving continuation that delves into the complexities of human relationships.

midnight.title: Before Midnight
midnight.repart: Ethan Hawke as Jesse, Julie Delpy as Celine
midnight.review: In "Before Midnight", the trilogy culminates in Greece, where we follow the life of Jesse and Celine after spending several years together as a couple. The film explores the challenges and tensions that arise in their relationship as they age and face family and personal issues. It is a realistic and bittersweet look at life as a couple.

hero.title: "Before" Trilogy Reviews
hero.text: What makes this trilogy exceptional is its focus on natural and deep dialogue, as well as its ability to capture the evolution of a relationship over the years. The chemistry between Hawke and Delpy is palpable, and their performance is incredibly authentic. The "Before" trilogy is a cinematic achievement that invites us to reflect on love, human connection, and the passage of time in a way that few other films achieve. Each movie is like a chapter in the lives of these characters, and together they form an emotional and memorable narrative.
